response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which is tailored to meet your specific needs and valued at $800,000. Considering its exceptional quality and the benefits it offers, I am extending an exclusive offer to you. I propose to sell this product to you at a special price of $750,000. This represents a significant saving for you while still allowing me to recover a substantial portion of the product's value. I believe this offer presents a unique opportunity for both of us to achieve mutual satisfaction. Please let me know if you require any further information or have any questions. I look forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 750000}
